description: The Arcane Archer kit allows you to combine magic and ranged weapon strikes. Your lack of armor keeps you mobile, and your magic makes your arrows explode to devastate your foes.
equipment: no armor and wield a bow.

signature_ability.name: Exploding Arrow
signature_ability.flavor_text: Your ammunition explodes with magical energy.

tier_effects.effect: 5 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
7 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
10 + A, R, I, or P fire damage

signature_ability.effect: One creature or object of your choice within 2 squares of the target takes fire damage equal to the characteristic score used for this ability's power roll.

description: Who says lightly armored heroes can't also be hard to move? You just need to employ some psionics! The Battlemind kit harnesses the power of your mind to make you harder to move—and to make your foes easier to push around.
equipment: light armor and wield a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Unmooring
signature_ability.flavor_text: Your weapon unleashes psionic energy that reduces your target's weight.

tier_effects.effect: 5 + M, R, I, or P damage
8 + M, R, I, or P damage
11 + M, R, I, or P damage

signature_ability.effect: Until the end of the target's next turn, any forced movement that affects the target has its distance increased by 2.

description: Providing throwable light weapons and light armor easily concealed by a cloak to confuse your enemies, the Cloak and Dagger kit makes you more mobile while increasing the effectiveness of your short-range strikes.
equipment: light armor and wield one or two light weapons.

signature_ability.name: Fade
signature_ability.flavor_text: A stab, and a few quick, careful steps back.

tier_effects.effect: 3 + M or A damage; you can shift 1 square
6 + M or A damage; you can shift up to 2 squares
8 + M or A damage; you can shift up to 3 squares

description: The Dual Wielder kit is for folks who want to excel at using two weapons at the same time. Your fighting style maximizes the power of each weapon you have in hand, making you a whirling dealer of death.
equipment: medium armor and wield a light weapon and a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Double Strike
signature_ability.flavor_text: Why strike once when you could do it twice?
signature_ability.effect: If you use this ability on your turn, you can use it against one target, then use your maneuver and your move action for that turn before using the ability against a second target. You still use the same power roll for both targets.

description: The Guisarmier kit is for those who want to use a polearm for extended reach while remaining protected by sturdy armor. This is the kit that allows you to become the ultimate halberd, longspear, or glaive fighter.
equipment: medium armor and wield a polearm.

signature_ability.name: Forward Thrust, Backward Smash
signature_ability.flavor_text: In your hands, the haft is as good as the head.

description: If you want to be fast in a fight, then Martial Artist is the kit for you. Unencumbered by weapons or armor, this fighting style rewards quick, focused unarmed strikes against opponents, and allows you to be the ultimate skirmisher.
equipment: no armor and wield only your unarmed strikes.

signature_ability.name: Battle Grace
signature_ability.flavor_text: You feint to move your enemies into perfect position.

tier_effects.effect: 8 + M or A damage; you can swap places with the target
11 + M or A damage; you can swap places with the target

signature_ability.effect: If you obtain a tier 2 or tier 3 outcome and can't swap places with the target because one or both of you is too big to fit into the swapped space, you both remain in your original spaces and the target takes 1 extra damage.

description: The Mountain kit does exactly what it says on the tin. You don heavy armor and raise a heavy weapon to stand strong against your foes, quickly demolishing them when it's your turn to strike.
equipment: heavy armor and wield a heavy weapon.

signature_ability.name: Pain for Pain
signature_ability.flavor_text: An enemy who tagged you will pay for that.
signature_ability.effect: If the target dealt damage to you since the end of your last turn, this strike deals additional damage equal to your Might or Agility score (your choice).

description: If you want a good balance of protection, speed, and damage, the Panther kit is for you. This kit increases your Stamina not by wearing armor, but through the focused battle preparation of body and mind, letting you be fast and mobile while swinging a heavy weapon at your foes.
equipment: no armor and wield a heavy weapon.

signature_ability.name: Devastating Rush
signature_ability.flavor_text: The faster you move, the harder you hit.
signature_ability.effect: You can move up to 3 squares straight toward the target before this strike, which deals extra damage equal to the number of squares you move this way.

description: Meant for brawlers and boxers, the Pugilist kit gives you access to a melee fighting style that grants a boost to Stamina and damage while allowing you to float like a butterfly. If you want to be a tough, strong hero who doles out punishment with your fists, then this kit is for you.
equipment: no armor and wield only your unarmed strikes.

signature_ability.name: Let's Dance
signature_ability.flavor_text: Keeping your enemies stumbling around the battlefield is second nature to you.
signature_ability.effect: You can shift into any square the target leaves after you slide them.

description: The Raider kit keeps you protected while granting you full mobility, providing a boost to speed and distance that lets you run around the battlefield like a Viking warrior.
equipment: light armor and wield a shield and a light weapon.

signature_ability.name: Raider's Awe
signature_ability.flavor_text: You execute a brutal strike that leaves your foe reeling. (Previously known as "Shock and Awe")
signature_ability.effect: The target takes a bane on their next power roll made before the end of their next turn.

description: The Ranger kit outfits you with medium armor and weapons for every challenge, letting you easily switch between melee and ranged combat. This kit provides a good balance of bonuses to defense and offense to create a hero who is a jack-of-all-trades.
equipment: medium armor and wield a bow and a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Hamstring Shot
signature_ability.flavor_text: A well-placed shot leaves your enemy struggling to move.

tier_effects.effect: 3 + M or A damage; A < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
5 + M or A damage; A < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
7 + M or A damage; A < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

description: The Rapid-Fire kit is for archers who want to deal maximum damage by shooting as many arrows as possible into nearby enemies. With this kit, your fighting technique focuses on peppering foes before they can get close enough to counterattack.
equipment: light armor and wield a bow.

signature_ability.name: Two Shot
signature_ability.flavor_text: When you fire two arrows back-to-back, both hit their mark.

description: The retiarius is often depicted as a lightly armored warrior with a net in one hand and a trident in the other, and this kit gives you the equipment and fighting technique to make that happen. Tie up your foe with a net and then poke them to death!
equipment: light armor and wield several ensnaring weapons and a polearm.

signature_ability.name: Net and Stab
signature_ability.flavor_text: The well-thrown net that follows your main attack leaves your foes right where you want them.

tier_effects.effect: 4 + M or A damage; A < WEAK, slowed (EoT)
6 + M or A damage; A < AVERAGE, slowed (EoT)
8 + M or A damage; A < STRONG, restrained (EoT)

description: The Shining Armor kit provides the most protection a kit can afford, providing you with the sword, shield, and armor necessary to play the prototypical knight.
equipment: heavy armor and wield a shield and a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Protective Attack
signature_ability.flavor_text: The strength of your assault makes it impossible for your foe to ignore you.
signature_ability.effect: The target is taunted until the end of their next turn.

description: The Sniper kit gives you the tools and techniques to take down enemies from afar. This kit can help you become the archer who lurks behind trees or down tunnels, picking off enemies with a bow or crossbow as they approach.
equipment: no armor and wield a bow.

signature_ability.name: Patient Shot
signature_ability.flavor_text: Breathe... aim... wait... then strike!
signature_ability.effect: If you don't take a move action this turn, this strike deals extra damage equal to your Might or Agility score (your choice).

description: The Spellsword kit combines melee strikes and a little bit of magic, letting you create a warrior who doesn't have to choose between the incantation and the blade.
equipment: light armor and wield a shield and a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Leaping Lightning
signature_ability.flavor_text: Lightning jumps from your weapon as you strike to harm a nearby foe.

tier_effects.effect: 5 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage
8 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage
11 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage

signature_ability.effect: A creature or object of your choice within 2 squares of the target takes lightning damage equal to the characteristic score used for this ability's power roll.

description: Armed with a simple reach weapon, often a quarterstaff, a character using the Stick and Robe kit is highly mobile thanks to their light armor. This allows your hero to make maximum use of their weapon's length.
equipment: light armor and wield a polearm.

signature_ability.name: Where I Want You
signature_ability.flavor_text: When your stick speaks, your enemy moves.

description: If you want to be mobile and deal a lot of damage with melee strikes, then you should reach for the Swashbuckler kit. This is a great kit for heroes who want to be master duelists.
equipment: light armor and wield a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Fancy Footwork
signature_ability.flavor_text: All combat is a dance—and you'll be the one leading.
signature_ability.effect: You can shift into any square the target leaves after you push them.

description: The Sword and Board kit doesn't just give you a shield—it makes the shield part of your offensive arsenal. With a medium weapon in one hand and a block of steel or solid oak in the other, you protect yourself while you control the battlefield.
equipment: medium armor and wield a shield and a medium weapon.

signature_ability.name: Shield Bash
signature_ability.flavor_text: In your hands, a shield isn't just for protection.

tier_effects.effect: 9 + M or A damage; push 3; M < STRONG, prone

description: The Warrior Priest kit imbues the power of the gods into your weapon, making it a smiting instrument. You wade into the fray without fear, thanks to the power of the divine... and the heavy armor you wear.
equipment: heavy armor and wield a light weapon.

signature_ability.name: Weakening Brand
signature_ability.flavor_text: The impact of your weapon brands your target for destruction.

tier_effects.effect: 3 + M, R, I, or P holy damage
5 + M, R, I, or P holy damage
8 + M, R, I, or P holy damage

signature_ability.effect: Until the end of the target's next turn, they have damage weakness equal to the characteristic score used for this ability's power roll.

description: The Whirlwind kit makes effective use of whips, granting you mobility, damage, and reach. If you want to be a fast-moving warrior who lashes foes with a chain or whip, then this is the kit for you.
equipment: no armor and wield a whip.

signature_ability.name: Extension of My Arm
signature_ability.flavor_text: When you draw your whip back after an attack, your enemy is drawn ever closer.

tier_effects.effect: 4 + M or A damage; vertical pull 1
7 + M or A damage; vertical pull 2
10 + M or A damage; vertical pull 3

description: Boren are tied to the craggy, rocky north, and this aspect is associated with the blizzard's bitter cold.

signature_ability.name: Bear Claws
signature_ability.flavor_text: Attacks with your sharp and deadly claws grab the weak.

aspect_benefits: Whenever you use forced movement to push a creature, you can pull that creature instead. Whenever you pull a creature adjacent to you and that creature has M < AVERAGE, you can use a free triggered action to make that creature grabbed by you.

animal_form.description: While you are in your bear form, your size is 2 and you gain a +1 bonus to distance with melee weapon abilities.

hybrid_form.description: While you are in your hybrid form, your size is 2 and you gain a +1 bonus to distance with melee weapon abilities. At 4th level, the first time you take hybrid form in an encounter, you gain 10 temporary Stamina.

growing_ferocity.benefit: Benefit
You can have up to two creatures grabbed at a time. Additionally, whenever you make a strike against a creature you have grabbed, you gain 1 surge.
The first time you grab a creature on a turn, you gain 1 surge.
You gain an edge on the Grab and Knockback maneuvers.
The first time you grab a creature on a turn, you gain 2 surges instead of 1.
You have a double edge on the Grab and Knockback maneuvers.

Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain 10 temporary Stamina. Additionally, whenever you have a creature grabbed, any ability roll made against that creature gains a bonus to its potency equal to your Might score.

description: Corven are tied to the mountain passes and the hot winds that flow through them. This aspect is associated with the warm and fast-rising anabatic wind.

signature_ability.name: Wing Buffet
signature_ability.flavor_text: Foes who try to close in around you do so at their peril.
signature_ability.effect: You can shift up to 2 squares before or after making the power roll.

aspect_benefits: You gain an edge on tests made to hide and sneak. Additionally, whenever you fall, you can use a free triggered action to use your Aspect of the Wild ability.

animal_form.description: While you are in your crow form, your size is 1T and you can fly. You can use the Hide maneuver as a free maneuver, and you can use your allies as cover when you hide. You can't use any abilities while in this form except for Aspect of the Wild.

hybrid_form.description: While you are in your hybrid form, your size is your choice of 1S or 1M. At 4th level, you can fly.

growing_ferocity.benefit: Benefit
Whenever you use the Disengage move action, the distance you can shift gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.
The first time you shift on a turn, you gain 1 surge.
You gain an edge on Agility tests, the Escape Grab maneuver, and the Knockback maneuver.
The first time you shift on a turn, you gain 2 surges instead of 1.
You have a double edge on Agility tests, the Escape Grab maneuver, and the Knockback maneuver.
Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain 10 temporary Stamina. Additionally, the potency of any effects targeting you is reduced by 2 for you.

description: Raden are associated with the wild nature of the rat, before cities became their habitat. This aspect is associated with the rat flood—a surge of corrupted water that draws forth hordes of rats.

signature_ability.name: Driving Pounce
signature_ability.flavor_text: Your enemies try in vain to fall back from your pouncing attack.
signature_ability.effect: You can shift up to the same number of squares that you pushed the target.

aspect_benefits: You gain an edge on tests made to hide and sneak. Additionally, you ignore difficult terrain.

animal_form.description: While you are in your rat form, your size is 1T and you can automatically climb at full speed while moving. You can use the Hide maneuver as a free maneuver, you can use your allies as cover when you hide, and you can stay hidden while you move through squares occupied by any creature. Additionally, you gain an edge on tests made to climb other creatures. You can't use any abilities while in this form except for Aspect of the Wild.

hybrid_form.description: While you are in your hybrid form, your size is your choice of 1S or 1M. At 4th level, you can automatically climb at full speed while moving.

growing_ferocity.benefit: Benefit
Whenever you use the Disengage move action, the distance you can shift gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.
The first time you shift on a turn, you gain 1 surge.
You gain an edge on Agility tests, the Escape Grab maneuver, and the Knockback maneuver.
The first time you shift on a turn, you gain 2 surges instead of 1.
You have a double edge on Agility tests, the Escape Grab maneuver, and the Knockback maneuver
Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain 10 temporary Stamina. Additionally, the potency of any effects targeting you is reduced by 2 for you.

description: Vuken are tied to forests and open steppes, and this aspect is associated with the thunderstorm.

signature_ability.name: Unbalancing Attack
signature_ability.flavor_text: A wild assault forces your foe onto their back.

aspect_benefits: Whenever you use the Knockback maneuver, you can then use the Aid Attack maneuver as a free triggered action.

animal_form.description: While you are in your wolf form, your size is 1L, you have a +2 bonus to speed, and you ignore difficult terrain.

hybrid_form.description: While you are in your hybrid form, your size is 1L, you have a +2 bonus to speed, and you ignore difficult terrain. At 4th level, the first time you take hybrid form in an encounter, you gain 10 temporary Stamina.

growing_ferocity.benefit: Benefit
Whenever you use the Knockback maneuver, you can target one additional creature.
The first time on a turn that you push a creature or knock a creature prone, you gain 1 surge.
You gain an edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.
The first time on a turn that you push a creature or knock a creature prone, you gain 2 surges.
You have a double edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.

Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain 10 temporary Stamina. Additionally, whenever you make a power roll that imposes forced movement on a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.
